sentences.sContent: Lower taxes made Republican voters happier with their party.
sentences.sCn: 更低的税率使共和党选民对该党更加满意。

remMethod.val: republic(共和政体； 共和国)+an(表“…的”或“信奉…的人”)→共和国的； 共和党人

trans.tranCn: 共和政体的； 共和国的
trans.tranOther: relating to or supporting a system of government that is not led by a king or queen
someone who believes in government by elected representatives only, with no king or queen
